name: Car-Pass asbl
membership: the complete list of the members is published in the annual report on  https://www.car-pass.be/en/news
goal: Car-Pass asbl is the association that, in implementing the Act of 11 June 2004 to curb fraud involving the vehicle mileage, is in charge of recording the mileage of vehicles in Belgium. The not-for-profit organisation has been accredited for this purpose by the Royal Decree of 4 May 2006.
interests: Consumers, Digital economy and society, Transport
euInitiatives:
• Legislative own-initiative report on odometer manipulation in motor vehicles
• All consumer protection policy initiatives pertaining to or relevant for tackling odometer fraud.
• All transport policy initiatives pertaining to or relevant for tackling odometer fraud
• EU roadworthiness directive
• EU Mobility package
